name: Ext_R3_DocumentReference_co_related
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.DocumentReference.context.related for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents DocumentReference.context.related from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DocumentReference|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: Related identifiers or resources associated with the DocumentReference.
element.comment: `DocumentReference.context.related` maps to R4 `DocumentReference.context.related`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Identifier of related objects or events
element.definition: Related identifier to this DocumentReference. If both id and ref are present they shall refer to the same thing.
element.comment: `DocumentReference.context.related` maps to R4 `DocumentReference.context.related`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Identifier of related objects or events
element.definition: Related identifier to this DocumentReference. If both id and ref are present they shall refer to the same thing.
element.comment: `DocumentReference.context.related` maps to R4 `DocumentReference.context.related`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Related Resource to this DocumentReference. If both id and ref are present they shall refer to the same thing.
element.comment: `DocumentReference.context.related` maps to R4 `DocumentReference.context.related`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Related Resource to this DocumentReference. If both id and ref are present they shall refer to the same thing.
element.comment: `DocumentReference.context.related` maps to R4 `DocumentReference.context.related`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
